body_html: I think it's better to just enable it for ByteTensors at the function API level torch.bernoulli and deprecate bernoulli_ immediately (don't bother with modifying it, just raise a warning in before_call:)
body_text: I think it's better to just enable it for ByteTensors at the function API level torch.bernoulli and deprecate bernoulli_ immediately (don't bother with modifying it, just raise a warning in before_call:)
body: I think it's better to just enable it for ByteTensors at the function API level `torch.bernoulli` and deprecate `bernoulli_` immediately (don't bother with modifying it, just raise a warning in `before_call:`)
